00063     {
00064         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00065         $sth = $pdo->prepare("INSERT INTO galleria.users (name, username, password) VALUES (?, ?, ?) RETURNING name");

00067         return $sth->fetchObject();

00079     public function addNewGroup($name, $admin)
00080     {
00081         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00082         if ($admin)
00083             $sth = $pdo->prepare("INSERT INTO galleria.groups (name, admin) VALUES (?, TRUE) RETURNING name");
00084         else
00085             $sth = $pdo->prepare("INSERT INTO galleria.groups (name) VALUES (?) RETURNING name");
00086         $sth->execute(array($name));
00087         return $sth->fetchObject();
00088     }

00100     public function addPicture($pg, $year, $desc)
00101     {
00102         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00103         $sth = $pdo->prepare("INSERT INTO galleria.pictures (photographer, year, description) VALUES (?, ?, ?) RETURNING id");
00104         return ($sth->execute(array($pg, $year, $desc))) ? (($pid = $sth->fetchObject()->id) ? (($this->_addChangelog(Galleria_Auth::getObject()->getUid(), $pid, 'Picture created.')) ? $pid : $pid) : null) : null;
00105     }

00114     public function getPics()
00115     {
00116         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00117         $sth = $pdo->prepare("SELECT DISTINCT pd.pid, pd.desc, pd.shown FROM galleria.picturedata AS pd WHERE pd.cid IS NULL OR pd.shown = FALSE");
00118         $sth->execute();
00119         return $this->_fetchObjects($sth);
